TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Those drivers are still hanging here because their truck needs a repair.

Bartender! A cup of vegan soup for the next poster.

Bartender: Sorry, we don't serve things that always announce their food preference before they say anything else to people.

Me: Ok one Vodka and a Round of soups on me!

*2 minutes later*

Me: Bartender!

Stan Lee: Yes?

Bartender... there is a Vegan in my SOUP!!!

You wanted meat broth, best we could do on short notice...

Waiter! My soup is frozen!

Well you asked for the coldest soup we have so there it is!

Waiter! There is a @Sigma88 in my SOUP!!!
________ ! There's a soup in my WAITER!!!

WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT? YOU CAN'T DROWN HIM, HE'S OUR BEST WAITER!

Waiter, there's a 50 cal. sniper round in my soup!

You should have a better look. There would be also sniper triangle and sniper square.

Manager! Why something always happen with your waiters?

Well, you did order the chef's surprise, didn't you? Don't say you thought that the surprise would be food!

Waiter, there is a cardboard cutout of David Tennant in my soup!

Yes. the actual David Tennant was in last week's ragu.

Waiter, there's a hare in my soup.

No sir, you are mistaken. That is a rabbit.

Waiter, there is a hair in my soup.

It's not a hair, it's a mildew.

Sanitary Inspector! Have you ever checked this diner?

were not in a sanitarium why do you want a sanitary inspector

waiter i have a §§§ "start the same" "then they spit" "interesting" §§§ in my soup ^^

Edited December 21, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''

You asked for the  double serving.

 

Waiter theres a mushroom (eh) in my soop.

Its fungi-ing very well sir!

Waiter! Why is there a Hitchhikers Guide to the galaxy movie in my Soup?

OOOH OOH CAN I WATCH IT!?!?!?

waiter! theres a football in my soup!

You ordered pigskin soup didn't you?

Waiter! The USS Marcon just "crash landed" onto my soup!

Ah no that was the Hindenburg. And it did not crash land.... it burnt up... Sorry about your soup.

Waiter! Why is there a Soup in my Soup, In my Soup, In MY SOUP-- SOUP-- SOUP-- SOUP-- SOUP.SOUP.SOUP.SOUP.SOUP.SOUPPPPPPPPPPP....... *Drops the Base*...

10 hours ago, SAS123 said:

Drops the Base

souplogsoup waiter = waiter. Is that what you meant?

Waiter, there's a bionic hand in my soup!

You've already eaten the other part of The Man, Mr. Murphy. (Z-Nation)

Waiter! Why the soup is talking to me?

*shoots soup* now it isn't.

Waiter, there's deer in my soup!

Then ask your dear to get face out. And stop pushing him/her into the plate.

Waiter! Wait.

Yes? Did you need further assistance.

Waiter! It's dangerous to go alone! Take this!

Sorry, I didn't ask for a banana.

 

Waiter! There's a lack of eggnog in my bowl!

We know, Our cook is trying to milk a hen right now.

Santa! Why this snow in my soup?

@kerbiloid You are on the Heston Fantastical Foods TV Show. It's not snow but supercooled Whisky!

Waiter! Why is there a Doctor Who in my soup?
